Medicines, Antiques, Luxuries, Toys, and Other items
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Items: Medicines, Antiques, Luxuries, Toys, and Other items
By Infernus on Saturday, February 28, 2004 - 08:19 pm:

Area abbreviations
Tg=Togle
R=Ryuwn
Tb=Torble
V=Vizley
A=Adventure

Medicines(drugs)

NameDescriptionBuySellArea(shop)Effect
BaisinIt raises Spirit during adventures.20001000V,A+300 adventure points to monster given#
LaroxRaises Intelligence, Speed and Accuracy during battle.20001000V*,A
NageelRaises Spirit a little during adventures.1000500V,A+100 adventure points to monster given#
TapaurinRaises Intelligence, Speed and Accuracy a little during battle.1000500V,A
TeromeanExcites the monster and maxes its Guts in preparation for battle.20001000V*,AAutomatic 99 guts for next tournament/ adventure
TrokatinRaises Strength, Toughness and Accuracy during battle.20001000V*,A
TroronRaises Strength,Toughness and Accuracy a little during battle1000500V,A

#= The amount added on may have variations when taking more than one monster on an adventure. The +100/+300 only applies to one monster.

Others

NameDescriptionBuySellArea(shop)Effect
BoneA plain, ordinary bone.105R,Anone
FishboneA rather big bone from a fish.42Anone
ReferenceA book crammed with all kinds of difficult information.1980990R,A-30 Stress
MedalsA medal needed to make a gadget with special properties.100(Healing=1000)50(Healing=500)AUsed to make special gadgets

Note about medals: Medals can be found in adventures pretty much anywhere (though higher adventures do have a tendency to give more). If you can't find them, you either haven't gotten the event with Wit, or you just haven't tried enough! There is NO secret to getting them!!!

* After shop upgrade
